支持列表
########

  +------------+------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
  |    架构    |        南向平台        |        部署模式       |        实时OS        |
  +============+========================+=======================+======================+
  |            |                        |       Jailhouse       |        zephyr        |
  |            |      qemu-aarch64      +-----------------------+----------------------+
  |            |                        |       bare-metal      |        zephyr        |
  |            +------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
  |   ARM64    |                        |       Jailhouse       |        zephyr        |
  |            |        树莓派4B        +-----------------------+----------------------+
  |            |                        |       bare-metal      |    zephyr,UniProton  |
  |            +------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
  |            |         Hi3093         |       bare-metal      |       UniProton      |
  +------------+------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
  |            |       qemu-x86_64      |       bare-metal      |       UniProton      |
  +   x86_64   +------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
  |            |        x86工控机       |       bare-metal      |       UniProton      |
  +------------+------------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+
